abstract: The list of doubters about Eli Lilly‘s $6.5 billion deal to buy ImClone Systems, the biotechnology company controlled by Carl C. Icahn, is growing.
lead_paragraph: The list of doubters about Eli Lilly‘s $6.5 billion deal to buy ImClone Systems, the biotechnology company controlled by Carl C. Icahn, is growing.

headline.main: Doubts Grow Over Lilly’s ImClone Deal
